column2: GigaMedia Ltd. engages in the provision of digital entertainment services. The company is headquartered in Taipei, Taipei and currently employs 251 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: Asian online game and service, and cloud service business. The firm has online game operations in Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau and a cloud computing software and services business based in Taipei. In online games, the Company owns and operates FunTown, an online game portal in Taiwan and Hong Kong. In cloud computing, it owns and operates GigaCloud, a provider of cloud computing solutions and related services focused on the cloud services market for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in Taiwan. FunTown is focused on the mobile and browser-based casual games and social casino games markets in Asia. The firm's FunTown platform provides various online game services, which include Player Clubs, Tournaments, Avatars, Friends and Family Messenger, Social Networking, Customer Services and Other Platforms.
8th Floor, No.22, Lane 407, Section 2, Tiding Boulevard, Neihu District
